headline: BLK Deepens Private Market Footprint With ElmTree Deal: Time to Buy?
summary: BlackRock expands deeper into private markets with its ElmTree buyout, boosting access to alternative investments and real estate. Is the stock worth buying?

raw.headline: BLK Deepens Private Market Footprint With ElmTree Deal: Time to Buy?
raw.summary: BlackRock expands deeper into private markets with its ElmTree buyout, boosting access to alternative investments and real estate. Is the stock worth buying?

headline: PRIV Begs the Question: Is Private Debt Right for ETFs?
summary: - Questions arise about the wisdom of holding illiquid investments in a format aimed at liquidity. - State Street/Apollo’s active PRIV ETF has stumbled since its February launch. - Private markets meet headwinds, as private equity raises less this year vs. 2024.

raw.headline: PRIV Begs the Question: Is Private Debt Right for ETFs?
raw.summary: - Questions arise about the wisdom of holding illiquid investments in a format aimed at liquidity. - State Street/Apollo’s active PRIV ETF has stumbled since its February launch. - Private markets meet headwinds, as private equity raises less this year vs. 2024.
